content: On what kind of celestial body did Captain Kirk and his crew live in the TV series 'Star Trek'?

Captain Kirk and his crew lived on the USS Enterprise, which was a starship, not a celestial body. The Enterprise was a spaceship that traveled through space, visiting various planets and other celestial bodies. So, while they didn't live on a specific celestial body, they explored many different ones throughout the TV series 'Star Trek'.
